title: [$500] Room - In admin room, when copy to clipboard, the room name is not shown as link

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

comments.body: Triggered auto assignment to @MitchExpensify (`Bug`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/14418 for more details.

### Bug0 Triage Checklist ([Main S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418))

- [x] This "bug" occurs on a supported platform (ensure `Platforms` in OP are ✅)
- [x] This bug is not a duplicate report (check [E/App issues](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues) and [#expensify-bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM))
    - If it is, comment with a link to the original report, close the issue and add any novel details to the original issue instead
- [x] This bug is reproducible using the reproduction steps in the OP. [S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418#:~:text=The%20bug%20is%20reproducible)
    - If the reproduction steps are clear and you're unable to reproduce the bug, check with the reporter and QA first, then close the issue.
    - If the reproduction steps aren't clear and you determine the correct steps, please update the OP.
- [x] This issue is filled out as thoroughly and clearly as possible
    - Pay special attention to the title, results, platforms where the bug occurs, and if the bug happens on staging/production.
- [x] I have reviewed and subscribed to the linked Slack conversation to ensure Slack/Github stay in sync
Triggered auto assignment to Contributor-plus team member for initial proposal review - @shubham1206agra (`External`)

## Proposal

### Please re-state the problem that we are trying to solve in this issue.
In admin room, when copy to clipboard, paste and send the invite message, the room name is not shown as link

### What is the root cause of that problem?
When copying the invite message, we're not attaching the link information `a` to the room name

### What changes do you think we should make in order to solve the problem?
<!-- DO NOT POST CODE DIFFS -->
When copying the invite message, attach the link information `a` to the room name, and copy it as HTML
1. Modify [this](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/2c0010423ebb9f2e6922554d52e97678122ce72d/src/libs/ReportUtils.js#L4210) to put room name in the `a` tag with the room link, the room id in room link can be taken from `originalMessage.reportID`
2. In [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/2c0010423ebb9f2e6922554d52e97678122ce72d/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/ContextMenuActions.js#L286) set the copied content as HTML, similar to what we already did [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/2c0010423ebb9f2e6922554d52e97678122ce72d/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/ContextMenuActions.js#L288). Then when pasting to the composer, the room name will show as markdown and already includes the link

### What alternative solutions did you explore? (Optional)
Add support for extracting room link from `#...` room name format, and add it as link when pasted. But this is more complicated, the above solution is enough to solve this already.

<!---
ATTN: Contributor+

You are the first line of defense in making sure every proposal has a clear and easily understood problem with a "root cause". Do not approve any proposals that lack a satisfying explanation to the first two prompts. It is CRITICALLY important that we understand the root cause at a minimum even if the solution doesn't directly address it. When we avoid this step we can end up solving the wrong problems entirely or just writing hacks and workarounds.

Instructions for how to review a proposal:

1. Address each contributor proposal one at a time and address each part of the question one at a time e.g. if a solution looks acceptable, but the stated problem is not clear then you should provide feedback and make suggestions to improve each prompt before moving on to the next. Avoid responding to all sections of a proposal at once. Move from one question to the next each time asking the contributor to "Please update your original proposal and tag me again when it's ready for review".

2. Limit excessive conversation and moderate issues to keep them on track. If someone is doing any of the following things please kindly and humbly course-correct them:

- Posting PRs.
- Posting large multi-line diffs (this is basically a PR).
- Skipping any of the required questions.
- Not using the proposal template at all.
- Suggesting that an existing issue is related to the current issue before a problem or root cause has been established.
- Excessively wordy explanations.

3. Choose the first proposal that has a reasonable answer to all the required questions.
-->

## Proposal

### Please re-state the problem that we are trying to solve in this issue.
In admin room, room name is not copied as link when copying invite message.
### What is the root cause of that problem?
We are just only including the room name as a text (not link) to the clipboard as in here:
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/libs/ReportUtils.js#L4213-L4219
### What changes do you think we should make in order to solve the problem?
<!-- DO NOT POST CODE DIFFS -->
We should extract the room link from `message.html` and parse it to markdown (so that it appears as a markdown to the compose) and copy to clipboard text
Change this 
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/libs/ReportUtils.js#L4219
to 
```
        const messageHtml = lodashGet(_.last(lodashGet(reportAction, 'message', [{}])), 'html');
        const roomLink = /<\/mention-user> to (<a href=[^>]*>#[^<]*<\/a>)/.exec(messageHtml)[1];
        const parser = new ExpensiMark();
        message += `${preposition} ${parser.htmlToMarkdown(roomLink)}`;
```
POC

https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/38649957/ad8b8022-e2e4-4fa5-b5cf-8a006018acfb



### What alternative solutions did you explore? (Optional)
@MitchExpensify, @shubham1206agra Whoops! This issue is 2 days overdue. Let's get this updated quick!

Thank you, both @FitseTLT and @tienifr, for your proposals.

Since both are proposing similar solutions and since @tienifr's [proposal](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31568#issuecomment-1819605751) came first. I think we should go with that.

🎀 👀 🎀 C+ reviewed
Triggered auto assignment to @luacmartins, see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/7972 for more details.
@shubham1206agra can you check if this is a regression of https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30898? If so, we should have @dukenv0307 work on a fix

I don't think that this is a regression. I think they only checked for the same text, which is reflected in their QA test.

If we want to create a link here, which is a design choice, then we can treat it as a separate issue.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 1.4.1-5 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** Y **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** **Logs:** https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/4856 **Expensify/Expensify Issue URL:** **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team **Slack conversation:** **Issue found when executing PR** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/30898 ## Action Performed: 1. Launch app 2. Tap start chat--- Room 3. Tap header---Invite a user to the room 4. In room page, long press the invite message and select copy to clipboard 5. Paste it in compose box and send the message 6. Note the copied message is displayed correctly 7. Navigate to LHN 8. Tap on admin room 9. Long press the invite message and select copy to clipboard 10. Paste it in compose box and send the message ## Expected Result: In admin room, when copy to clipboard, paste and send the invite message, the room name must be shown as link ## Actual Result: In admin room, when copy to clipboard, paste and send the invite message, the room name is not shown as link ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [x] Android: Native - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: Native - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos Add any screenshot/video evidence https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/78819774/1a089d40-3a51-4c19-9852-c591db71ea6b [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
